metadata.title: CVE-2022-3706 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper authorization in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 7.14prior to 15.3.5, 15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5 prior to 15.5.2 allows auser retrying a job in a downstream pipeline to take ownership of theretried jobs in the upstream pipeline even if the user doesn't have accessto that project.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
